title: Best of The Program | 11/23/20
description:
Stu and Pat fill in for Glenn. President Trump’s legal team distanced itself from attorney Sidney Powell, leading to confusion about whether she was ever part of the team. Will she soon release evidence of her election fraud claims? New York Gov. Andrew Cuomo will receive an Emmy for his coronavirus press conferences, and Stu’s not too thrilled. Is Disney+ a good buy for adults? “The Mandalorian” star Gina Carano faced cancel culture attacks after mocking Democrats’ mask policies.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
